name: 咬咬

effect.description: A sharp pixelated bite that deals physical damage and has a 30% chance to cause the target to flinch for 1 turn, preventing their action.

visualPrompt: 8-bit pixel art, side-view RPG battle, a giant set of white and grey jagged jaws materialize over a sprite and snap shut violently, white flash impact frames, 8-bit pixel debris, solid black background, vibrant limited color palette, retro arcade aesthetic.
secondaryEffectPrompt: 8-bit pixel animation of three yellow stars spinning in a circle above a character sprite to indicate flinching, retro game UI style, sharp pixel edges, flat 2D perspective.
